content:
For those who haven't seen it yet, GraalVM is finally getting a Wasm backend for its Native Image feature, which I for one never thought would happen (and am delighted to be proven wrong about): https://2025.wasm.io/sessions/the-future-of-write-once-run-anywhere-from-java-to-webassembly/

WASM I/O • 27-28 Mar • Barcelona 2025
The Future of Write Once, Run Anywhere: From Java to WebAssembly • Wasm I/O 2025. A 2-day WebAssembly conference in Barcelona, Spain
